numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed a difference between younger people and older people.
2. Younger people from many countries are more optimistic than older people.
5. I wonder about the future leaders of America.
6. The younger generation may have higher hopes for the future of the world.
7. Programs to decrease global warming exist.
9. If the younger generation has higher hopes, then the programs to decrease global warming will have greater momentum.
10. If the younger generation has higher hopes, then the programs to preserve habitats will have greater momentum.
12. I am surrounded by future leaders.
13. If future leaders have more hope for the future, then we will be more motivated to change the world for the better.
14. The headline is: The hope of humanity lies with the young.
